actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
